analysis.description:

UselessReserveBank.bribe has external calls inside a loop:
	- treasuryOfficials[i].transfer(bribePerOfficial) (/unique_chucks/14/0x7a83db2d2737c240c77c7c5d8be8c2ad68f6ff23.sol#369-370)

UselessReserveBank.pilfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- treasuryOfficials[i].transfer(amountPerOfficial) (/unique_chucks/14/0x7a83db2d2737c240c77c7c5d8be8c2ad68f6ff23.sol#389-390)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x7a83db2d2737c240c77c7c5d8be8c2ad68f6ff23.sol#133-134:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
